import React from "react"; import data from "../data/fun-facts.json"; import CountUp from "react-countup"; const Funfacts = ({isBg}) => { const {funfacts} = data; return(
{funfacts.subtitle}

{funfacts.title}

    {funfacts.funFactsItems.map((data, i) => (
  • {data.title}
    • ))}
) } export default Funfacts;
